events.message: I recently purchased a product from your store but I am not satisfied with it and would like to request a refund.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request based on the message content.
Assigning the refund case to agent Emily for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you would like to return the product?
My order number is 123456789. The product did not meet my expectations and I would like to receive a full refund.
I have processed your refund request and you will receive the money back within 5 business days. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Thank you for the quick reply and processing my refund. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund case has been resolved and the customer has been informed about the refund timeline.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been formally closed after confirmation of the refund completion and customer satisfaction.
